configuration.description: ALB SG
BE ECS SERVICE SG
BE CODEPIPELINES SG
HTTPS from VPC for AWS service access
Allow all outbound traffic for CodePipeline
HTTPS to VPC endpoints for AWS services

albListenerRules._comment: Transform URL: Strips /api prefix from incoming requests before forwarding to NestJS container. Pulumi AWS provider uses urlRewriteConfig (not type field) to apply URL transforms.

configuration.description: ADMIN ECS SERVICE SG
ADMIN CODEPIPELINES SG
HTTPS from VPC for AWS service access
Allow all outbound traffic for CodePipeline
HTTPS to VPC endpoints for AWS services

albListenerRules._comment: NO Transform URL for admin! Django receives full path /admin/* and serves static files from /admin/static/

configuration.description: FE ECS SERVICE SG
FE CODEPIPELINES SG
ALB to FE ECS
All outbound from FE ECS
HTTPS from VPC for AWS service access
Allow all outbound traffic for CodePipeline
HTTPS to VPC endpoints for AWS services

albListenerRules._comment: Transform URL for /fe (without trailing slash) - redirect to root path

Transform URL for /fe/* (with trailing slash) - strips /fe prefix from incoming requests before forwarding to Next.js container. Pulumi AWS provider uses urlRewriteConfig (not type field) to apply URL transforms.
